title: Ken's spicy chicken Thai green curry
ingredients: ['2 (400ml) tins coconut milk', '2 tablespoons green curry paste', '160ml chicken stock', '1 (220g) tin sliced water chestnuts, drained', '1 (225g) tin sliced bamboo shoots, drained', '1 green pepper, cut into 2cm pieces', '75g sliced fresh mushrooms', '3 boneless, skinless chicken breast fillets, diced', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh basil']
